casebody.data:
GILSON
v.
DESCHENES 182P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2019 Kathleen Deschenes, for Deschenes, Kathleen. Thomas Gilson, for Gilson, Thomas.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of May 2019 by Defendant to Waive Fee:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of May 2019."
